trans-unit.resname: RAV·1 | Auratouched Mage | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Auratouched Mage
trans-unit.target: 灵佑法师

trans-unit.resname: RAV·1 | Auratouched Mage | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, search your library for an Aura card that could enchant it. If CARDNAME is still in play, attach that Aura to it. Otherwise, reveal the Aura card and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，从你的牌库中搜寻一张可以结附它的灵气牌。 若CARDNAME仍在场上，则将该灵气结附于其上。 若否，则展示该灵气牌，并将它置入你手上。 然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·2 | Bathe in Light | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bathe in Light
trans-unit.target: 浸浴明光

trans-unit.resname: RAV·2 | Bathe in Light | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Radiance Choose a color. Target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it gain protection from the chosen color until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 辉耀～选择一种颜色。 目标生物和每个与该生物有共通颜色的其它生物获得反该色保护异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·2 | Bathe in Light | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Truth shines even in darkness. Those who march on the side of truth walk always in righteous light."
trans-unit.target: 「纵使在黑暗中，真理依旧光采慑人。 正义光芒必将眷顾与真理同行者。」

trans-unit.resname: RAV·3 | Benevolent Ancestor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Benevolent Ancestor
trans-unit.target: 善心祖灵

trans-unit.resname: RAV·3 | Benevolent Ancestor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
trans-unit.target: 守军（此生物不能攻击。）

trans-unit.resname: RAV·3 | Benevolent Ancestor | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
trans-unit.target: {T}：于本回合中，防止接下来将对目标生物或牌手造成的1点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·3 | Benevolent Ancestor | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Although the door is flimsy and the lock pathetically small, Josuri's family never fears the night outside.
trans-unit.target: 乔苏里一家虽只有薄薄的门板与袖珍的门锁，却从没因入夜而担忧过。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·4 | Blazing Archon | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Blazing Archon
trans-unit.target: 辉光统领

trans-unit.resname: RAV·4 | Blazing Archon | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: RAV·4 | Blazing Archon | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Creatures can't attack you.
trans-unit.target: 生物不能攻击你。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·4 | Blazing Archon | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Through the haze of battle I saw the glint of sun on golden mane, the sheen of glory clad in mail, and I dropped my sword and wept at the idiocy of war."\n—Dravin, Gruul deserter
trans-unit.target: 「在滚滚战尘中，我见到金色鬃毛上闪耀的阳光，荣誉之光辉披甲现身；我于是丢下了剑，为身处这愚蠢战争而流泪。」 ～古鲁叛逃者卓文

trans-unit.resname: RAV·5 | Boros Fury-Shield | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Boros Fury-Shield
trans-unit.target: 波洛斯怒火盾

trans-unit.resname: RAV·5 | Boros Fury-Shield | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target attacking or blocking creature this turn. If {R} was spent to play CARDNAME, it deals damage to that creature's controller equal to the creature's power.
trans-unit.target: 于本回合中，防止将由目标进行攻击或阻挡的生物造成之所有战斗伤害。 若你使用CARDNAME时支付了{R}，则此咒语对该生物的操控者造成若干伤害，其数量等同于该生物的力量。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·6 | Caregiver | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Caregiver
trans-unit.target: 照护人

trans-unit.resname: RAV·6 | Caregiver | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {W}, Sacrifice a creature: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
trans-unit.target: {W}，牺牲一个生物：于本回合中，防止接下来将对目标生物或牌手造成的1点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·6 | Caregiver | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The guilds each believe its way is right, but their ways only bring blood to Ravnica's streets and tears to Ravnica's families."
trans-unit.target: 「每个公会都相信自己依正道而行，但这些正道只会让拉尼卡的街道染血，令拉尼卡的家庭哭泣。」

trans-unit.resname: RAV·7 | Chant of Vitu-Ghazi | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Chant of Vitu-Ghazi
trans-unit.target: 维图加基吟颂

trans-unit.resname: RAV·7 | Chant of Vitu-Ghazi | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Convoke (Each creature you tap while playing this spell reduces its cost by {1} or by one mana of that creature's color.)
trans-unit.target: 召集（使用此咒语时，你每为它横置一个生物，便可以少支付{1}，或一点所横置生物颜色的法术力。）

trans-unit.resname: RAV·7 | Chant of Vitu-Ghazi | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Prevent all damage that would be dealt by creatures this turn. You gain 1 life for each damage prevented this way.
trans-unit.target: 防止生物于本回合中将造成的所有伤害。 每以此法防止1点伤害，你便获得1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·8 | Concerted Effort | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Concerted Effort
trans-unit.target: 协力合作

trans-unit.resname: RAV·8 | Concerted Effort | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, all creatures you control gain flying until end of turn if a creature you control has flying. The same is true for fear, first strike, double strike, landwalk, protection, trample, and vigilance.
trans-unit.target: 在每位牌手的维持开始时，如果由你操控的某个生物具有飞行异能，则所有由你操控的生物获得飞行异能直到回合结束； 且恐惧，先攻，连击，地行者，保护，践踏，以及警戒等异能亦比照办理。

trans-unit.source: Equenauts are the seeds of the Conclave, scattered on the four winds, searching for new places to take root.
trans-unit.target: 飞马骑士是盟会的种子，乘风飞向四方，寻找适合生根茁壮的新领域。

trans-unit.target: 召集（使用此咒语时，你每为它横置一个生物，便可以少支付{1}，或一点所横置生物颜色的法术力。）

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, you gain 1 life for each creature you control.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，你每操控一个生物，便获得1点生命。

trans-unit.target: 飞行，警戒

trans-unit.resname: RAV·12 | Courier Hawk | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Orzhov started using hawks as messengers in order to bypass the many toll roads and bridges that dot Ravnica. Soon the service became one of their most profitable businesses.
trans-unit.target: 欧佐夫开始用老鹰来当作信差，好避开散布拉尼卡全境的收费道路与桥梁。 这项服务很快便成为该公会最赚钱的生意。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·13 | Devouring Light | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Devouring Light
trans-unit.target: 明光吞噬

trans-unit.target: 将目标进行攻击或阻挡的生物移出对战。

trans-unit.source: Into the light the good are welcomed, and with the light the evil are banished.
trans-unit.target: 明光将包容善者、放逐恶徒。

trans-unit.target: {T}，牺牲CARDNAME：CARDNAME对目标进行攻击或阻挡的生物造成3点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·14 | Divebomber Griffin | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Justice flies swiftly on angry wings.
trans-unit.target: 正义藉怒火展翼翱翔。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·15 | Dromad Purebred | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dromad Purebred
trans-unit.target: 纯种卓马

trans-unit.resname: RAV·15 | Dromad Purebred | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME is dealt damage, you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME受到伤害时，你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·15 | Dromad Purebred | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I have seen much from the back of my dromad, most of it terribly wrong. The more I see, the more I am convinced of the rightness of my path."\n—Heruj, Selesnya initiate
trans-unit.target: 「我在卓马背上见识过不少事情，绝大部分都不该发生。 看得愈多，我对自己所行之道的信心便愈加坚定。」 ～瑟雷尼亚新手荷路杰

trans-unit.resname: RAV·16 | Faith's Fetters | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，你获得4点生命。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·16 | Faith's Fetters | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Enchanted permanent's activated abilities can't be played unless they're mana abilities. If enchanted permanent is a creature, it can't attack or block.
trans-unit.target: 除了法术力异能之外，受此结界的永久物之起动式异能都不能使用。 若受此结界的永久物是生物，则它便不能进行攻击或阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·17 | Festival of the Guildpact | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Festival of the Guildpact
trans-unit.target: 十会盟节庆

trans-unit.resname: RAV·17 | Festival of the Guildpact | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to you this turn.
trans-unit.target: 于本回合中，防止接下来将对你造成的X点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·17 | Festival of the Guildpact | Card Text | Paragraph 2

trans-unit.target: 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·17 | Festival of the Guildpact | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Everyone knows that violence at the Festival brings the worst of luck, so for at least one day a year arms are laid down in favor of brimming goblets.
trans-unit.target: 大家都晓得：若在节庆当日行使暴力，将招致无尽厄运缠身，所以一整年至少有一天该要放下武器、举杯欢庆。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·18 | Flickerform | Card Name

trans-unit.resname: RAV·18 | Flickerform | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {2}{W}{W}: Remove enchanted creature and all Auras attached to it from the game. At end of turn, return that card to play under its owner's control. If you do, return those Auras to play under their owners' control enchanting that creature.
trans-unit.target: {2}{W}{W}：将受此结界的生物与结附其上的所有灵气移出对战。 在回合结束时，将该牌在其拥有者的操控下移回场上。 若你如此作，则将这些灵气在其拥有者的操控下移回场上，并结附于该生物上。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·19 | Gate Hound | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 守门犬

trans-unit.resname: RAV·19 | Gate Hound | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: 只要CARDNAME上结附了结界，由你操控的生物便具有警戒异能。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·19 | Gate Hound | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Ditri, I leave this checkpoint in your capable teeth."\n—Kitov, nightguard patrol
trans-unit.target: 「迪奇，这检查哨由你的牙齿来把关就没问题了。」 ～夜巡守卫积托夫

trans-unit.resname: RAV·20 | Ghosts of the Innocent | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ghosts of the Innocent
trans-unit.target: 无辜魂魅

trans-unit.resname: RAV·20 | Ghosts of the Innocent | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If a source would deal damage to a creature or player, it deals half that damage, rounded down, to that creature or player instead.
trans-unit.target: 若任一来源将对生物或牌手造成伤害，则改为它对该生物或牌手造成一半数量的伤害，小数点后舍去。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·20 | Ghosts of the Innocent | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Ma said we should offer up blini-cakes and salt to the good ones, but I get that chill up my spine and just shut the door."\n—Otak, Tin Street shopkeep
trans-unit.target: 「妈说我们该用布理尼薄饼与盐来供奉善良灵魂，但我只觉得一阵背脊发凉，就连忙把门关上。」 ～锡街店员欧塔

trans-unit.resname: RAV·21 | Hour of Reckoning | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Hour of Reckoning
trans-unit.target: 报应时刻

trans-unit.resname: RAV·21 | Hour of Reckoning | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Convoke (Each creature you tap while playing this spell reduces its cost by {1} or by one mana of that creature's color.)
trans-unit.target: 召集（使用此咒语时，你每为它横置一个生物，便可以少支付{1}，或一点所横置生物颜色的法术力。）

trans-unit.resname: RAV·21 | Hour of Reckoning | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Destroy all nontoken creatures.
trans-unit.target: 消灭所有非衍生物的生物。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·21 | Hour of Reckoning | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Ravnica, like a hedge, must be pruned, leaving only leaves of verdant uniformity."\n—Niszka, Selesnya evangel
trans-unit.target: 「拉尼卡正如篱笆，需要时时修剪，只保留苍翠的树叶。」 ～瑟雷尼亚福音师尼斯卡

trans-unit.resname: RAV·22 | Hunted Lammasu | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Hunted Lammasu

trans-unit.resname: RAV·22 | Hunted Lammasu | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: RAV·22 | Hunted Lammasu | Card Text | Paragraph 2

trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，将一个4/4黑色的惊惧兽衍生物在目标对手的操控下放置进场。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·22 | Hunted Lammasu | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The lammasu ruled the velds before the city grew. Now they roam Ravnica's skies, but their ancient enemies have not forgotten them.
trans-unit.target: 早在城市矗立之前，拉玛苏便统治着草原； 现今他们遨游于拉尼卡的天空，但其宿敌可还没忘记他们。

trans-unit.target: 辉耀～消灭目标结界和每个与该结界有共通颜色的其它结界。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·23 | Leave No Trace | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The magic of the Boros patrols the streets even when their soldiers do not.
trans-unit.target: 波洛斯的法术能行于麾下士兵未及之处。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·24 | Light of Sanction | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Legion looks after its own.
trans-unit.target: 教团将保护自己人。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·25 | Loxodon Gatekeeper | Card Name

trans-unit.source: The gatekeepers are so fastidious that even the winds must wait to pass.
trans-unit.target: 门卫认真执勤，连风都得等着通关。

trans-unit.source: Nightguard Patrol

trans-unit.source: "The Wojek defend the laws. We defend the people."
trans-unit.target: 「沃耶克保卫律法； 我们则保卫人民。」

trans-unit.resname: RAV·27 | Oathsworn Giant | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Oathsworn Giant
trans-unit.target: 立誓巨人

trans-unit.resname: RAV·27 | Oathsworn Giant | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: 由你操控的其它生物得+0/+2并具有警戒异能。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·27 | Oathsworn Giant | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The town stands on his ancestors' former burial grounds. Even with the graves long gone, he continues his determined vigil.
trans-unit.target: 这小镇座落在他先祖的埋骨之地。 虽然坟墓早不复见，他决心依旧守夜下去。

trans-unit.target: 舞砂精

trans-unit.resname: RAV·28 | Sandsower | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: It drifts through the streets as a breeze of collective sighs, wilting the bustle with dreams and heavy eyelids.
trans-unit.target: 它如众声叹息般游移大街小巷，以睡梦与沉重眼皮让喧闹忙乱逐渐消失。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·29 | Screeching Griffin | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Screeching Griffin
trans-unit.target: 尖鸣狮鹫

trans-unit.resname: RAV·29 | Screeching Griffin | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: RAV·29 | Screeching Griffin | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {R}: Target creature can't block CARDNAME this turn.
trans-unit.target: {R}：目标生物本回合中不能阻挡CARDNAME。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·29 | Screeching Griffin | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: They were master fishers, but their seas are now the streets and their catch, the goblins that run pell-mell from the screeching in the sky.
trans-unit.target: 他们过去是捕鱼好手；现在街道取代了海洋，听闻尖鸣而乱窜的则是精灵。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·30 | Seed Spark | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Seed Spark
trans-unit.target: 播种灵光

trans-unit.resname: RAV·30 | Seed Spark | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. If {G} was spent to play CARDNAME, put two 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens into play.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标神器或结界。 若你使用CARDNAME时支付了{G}，则将两个1/1绿色的腐生物衍生物放置进场。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·30 | Seed Spark | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "If you ask me, those root-lovers value mindless dogma over progress."\n—Trivaz, Izzet mage
trans-unit.target: 「若想知道我的想法，我会说这些爱木头的家伙把愚蠢教条看得比进步还重要。」 ～伊捷法师崔瓦兹

trans-unit.resname: RAV·31 | Suppression Field | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Suppression Field
trans-unit.target: 抑制力场

trans-unit.resname: RAV·31 | Suppression Field | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Activated abilities cost {2} more to play unless they're mana abilities.
trans-unit.target: 除了法术力异能之外，起动式异能的费用增加{2}来使用。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·31 | Suppression Field | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The most feared of Azorius punishments is to be freed—sent back out into the world, stripped of all magical defenses.
trans-unit.target: 俄佐立最恐怖的刑罚便是纵放野外～剥夺所有的法术防护，丢回这个世界。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·32 | Three Dreams | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Three Dreams
trans-unit.target: 三个梦想

trans-unit.resname: RAV·32 | Three Dreams | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Search your library for up to three Aura cards with different names, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 从你的牌库中搜寻至多三张名称各不相同的灵气牌，展示这些牌，并将它们置入你手上。 然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·32 | Three Dreams | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Choose one to heal, one to harm, and one to grant you the prudence to use them."\n—Miotri, auratouched mage
trans-unit.target: 「选一个来医治伤痛，一个来损害敌人，另一个则让你得以慎用。」 ～灵佑法师米欧翠

trans-unit.target: 暮色牧灵

trans-unit.target: {2}{W}，从CARDNAME上移去一个+1/+1指示物：将两个1/1白色，具飞行异能的精怪衍生物放置进场。

trans-unit.target: 老兵锻甲师

trans-unit.target: 由你操控的其它生物得+0/+1。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·34 | Veteran Armorer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Give me a sword and I'll kill a few enemies. But give me a hammer and a fiery forge, and I'll turn the tide of battle."
trans-unit.target: 「给我把剑，我就能为你杀敌。 若给我把锤子与火热的打铁炉，我就能扭转战局。」

trans-unit.resname: RAV·35 | Votary of the Conclave | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Votary of the Conclave
trans-unit.target: 盟会信奉者

trans-unit.target: {2}{G}：重生CARDNAME。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·35 | Votary of the Conclave | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: An ageless order, the votaries receive the gift of rejuvenation from the temple gardens they guard.
trans-unit.target: 根据永恒的旨意，保卫殿堂花园的信奉者将得到花园的回春献礼。

trans-unit.target: 沃耶克药剂师

trans-unit.target: 辉耀～{T}：于本回合中，防止接下来将对目标生物和每个与该生物有共通颜色的其它生物造成的1点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·36 | Wojek Apothecary | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "A few arrows aren't enough to pierce your faith, soldier. You'll be back on the battlefield by sun's dawn."
trans-unit.target: 「大兵啊，几支箭射不穿你的信念的。 在黎明之前，你就能重返战场。」

trans-unit.target: 辉耀～目标生物和每个与该生物有共通颜色的其它生物得+1/+1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: It is the call to arms, the call to fury, the call to blood.
trans-unit.target: 这是武装的呼唤，愤怒的呼唤，流血的呼唤。

trans-unit.target: 「我对史芬斯的感觉很复杂。 虽然渴求他们的知识，但实在受不了他们神秘兮兮的样子。」 ～札戴克

trans-unit.resname: RAV·57 | Lore Broker | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Lies are sold as often as truths—and used just as effectively.
trans-unit.target: 谎言与实情不但销量一样好，用起来也同样有效。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·58 | Mark of Eviction | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mark of Eviction
trans-unit.target: 驱赶印记

trans-unit.resname: RAV·58 | Mark of Eviction | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature
trans-unit.target: 生物结界

trans-unit.resname: RAV·58 | Mark of Eviction | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, return enchanted creature and all Auras attached to that creature to their owners' hands.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，将受此结界的生物与结附在该生物上的所有灵气分别移回其拥有者的手上。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·58 | Mark of Eviction | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Tharashk the Bold suddenly wasn't himself. Or anyone else, for that matter.
trans-unit.target: 那东西突然间把大块头萨拉夏弄不见了。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·59 | Mnemonic Nexus | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mnemonic Nexus
trans-unit.target: 记忆连通

trans-unit.resname: RAV·59 | Mnemonic Nexus | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each player shuffles his or her graveyard into his or her library.
trans-unit.target: 每位牌手将其坟墓场洗回其牌库。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·59 | Mnemonic Nexus | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: True enlightenment comes not with a new thought, but with understanding of all the old ones.
trans-unit.target: 真的启悟不只是有了新想法，还得要理解所有旧想法。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·60 | Muddle the Mixture | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Muddle the Mixture
trans-unit.target: 弄混配方

trans-unit.resname: RAV·60 | Muddle the Mixture | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Counter target instant or sorcery spell.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标瞬间或法术咒语。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·60 | Muddle the Mixture | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Transmute {1}{U}{U} ({1}{U}{U}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same converted mana cost as this card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. Play only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 易质{1}{U}{U}（{1}{U}{U}，弃掉此牌：从你的牌库中搜寻一张总法术力费用与它相同的牌，展示该牌，并置于你手上。 然后将你的牌库洗牌。 使用的时机视同法术。）

trans-unit.resname: RAV·61 | Peel from Reality | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Peel from Reality
trans-unit.target: 实界剥除

trans-unit.resname: RAV·61 | Peel from Reality | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return target creature you control and target creature you don't control to their owners' hands.
trans-unit.target: 将目标由你操控的生物与目标不由你操控的生物分别移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·61 | Peel from Reality | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: When House Dimir's secrets are in danger of exposure, the guild takes drastic measures to cover its tracks.
trans-unit.target: 底密尔会堂的秘密若有外泄之虞，公会将采取断然措施来隐蔽其形迹。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·62 | Quickchange | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Quickchange
trans-unit.target: 快速变装

trans-unit.resname: RAV·62 | Quickchange | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature's color becomes the color or colors of your choice until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 直到回合结束，目标生物的颜色成为由你选择的颜色或颜色组合。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·62 | Quickchange | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·62 | Quickchange | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Most Ravnicans lead lives of desperate survival. Those who thrive are malleable enough to change with the ever-shifting politics of the guilds.
trans-unit.target: 大部分的拉尼卡住民都得努力求生。 而有能力生存下来的人，都有极高的可塑性，好面对公会间不断变动的政治局势。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·63 | Remand | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Remand
trans-unit.target: 奉还

trans-unit.resname: RAV·63 | Remand | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Counter target spell. If you do, return that spell card to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标咒语。 若你如此作，则将该咒语牌移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·63 | Remand | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·63 | Remand | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Well, at least all of that arm-waving and arcane babbling you did was impressive."
trans-unit.target: 「嗯，至少你挥舞的手势与连串咕哝让我印象很深刻。」

trans-unit.resname: RAV·64 | Snapping Drake | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Snapping Drake
trans-unit.target: 闪光龙兽

trans-unit.resname: RAV·64 | Snapping Drake | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: RAV·64 | Snapping Drake | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The irritable drakes are solitary nesters. Even brooding females barely contain the urge to attack their own young.
trans-unit.target: 暴躁的龙兽习于独居。 即使是守巢孵蛋的雌性，也会忍不住攻击亲生幼雏。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·65 | Spawnbroker | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Spawnbroker
trans-unit.target: 活物掮客

trans-unit.resname: RAV·65 | Spawnbroker | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, you may exchange control of target creature you control and target creature with power less than or equal to that creature's power an opponent controls.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，你可以选择目标由你操控的生物，与目标由对手操控、且力量小于或等于前述生物的生物，并交换它们的操控权。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·65 | Spawnbroker | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The trick isn't setting up the bad trade. It's making each side think it got the better deal."
trans-unit.target: 「诀窍不在于设计交易圈套， 而是如何让双方都觉得自己有赚头。」

trans-unit.resname: RAV·66 | Stasis Cell | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Stasis Cell
trans-unit.target: 静态牢笼

trans-unit.resname: RAV·66 | Stasis Cell | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature
trans-unit.target: 生物结界

trans-unit.resname: RAV·66 | Stasis Cell | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
trans-unit.target: 受此结界的生物于其操控者的重置步骤中不能重置。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·66 | Stasis Cell | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {3}{U}: Attach CARDNAME to target creature.
trans-unit.target: {3}{U}：将CARDNAME结附在目标生物上。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·66 | Stasis Cell | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Simic created the cells to preserve their experiments. The Azorius put the cells to use on the guilty.
trans-unit.target: 析米克的成员制造此种牢笼，好用来保存实验品。 俄佐立的成员则用牢笼来监禁罪犯。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·67 | Surveilling Sprite | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Surveilling Sprite
trans-unit.target: 监视仙灵

trans-unit.resname: RAV·67 | Surveilling Sprite | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: RAV·67 | Surveilling Sprite | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME is put into a graveyard from play, you may draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME从场上置入坟墓场时，你可以抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·67 | Surveilling Sprite | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Their natural curiosity, combined with a knack for trespassing, makes sprites excellent spies.
trans-unit.target: 与生俱来的好奇心，加上熟练的入侵技巧，让仙灵成为最佳的间谍人选。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·68 | Tattered Drake | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Tattered Drake
trans-unit.target: 败翼龙兽

trans-unit.resname: RAV·68 | Tattered Drake | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: RAV·68 | Tattered Drake | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {B}: Regenerate CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: {B}：重生CARDNAME。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·68 | Tattered Drake | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Drakes embody the worst of Ravnica: great potential, twisted by selfishness and greed."\n—Razia
trans-unit.target: 「这龙兽具现了拉尼卡的丑陋面：拥有过人潜力，却因自私和贪欲而扭曲。」 ～拉基雅

trans-unit.resname: RAV·69 | Telling Time | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Telling Time
trans-unit.target: 显现未来

trans-unit.resname: RAV·69 | Telling Time | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand, one on top of your library, and one on the bottom of your library.
trans-unit.target: 检视你牌库顶的三张牌。 将其中一张置于你手上，一张置于你牌库顶，另一张置于你牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·69 | Telling Time | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Mastery is achieved when "telling time" becomes "telling time what to do."
trans-unit.target: 若能从「显现未来」进步到「命令未来去做什么」，就算是大功告成。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·70 | Terraformer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Terraformer
trans-unit.target: 地貌塑师

trans-unit.resname: RAV·70 | Terraformer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}: Choose a basic land type. The land type of each land you control becomes that type until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {1}：选择一种基本地类别。 由你操控的地之地类别成为该类别直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·70 | Terraformer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "This feels a little more like home."
trans-unit.target: 「这样才更像是家。」

trans-unit.resname: RAV·71 | Tidewater Minion | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Tidewater Minion
trans-unit.target: 潮水仆役

trans-unit.resname: RAV·71 | Tidewater Minion | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
trans-unit.target: 守军（此生物不能攻击。）

trans-unit.resname: RAV·71 | Tidewater Minion | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {4}: CARDNAME loses defender until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {4}：CARDNAME失去守军异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·71 | Tidewater Minion | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {T}: Untap target permanent.
trans-unit.target: {T}：重置目标永久物。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·72 | Tunnel Vision | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Tunnel Vision
trans-unit.target: 视像开通

trans-unit.resname: RAV·72 | Tunnel Vision | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Name a card. Target player reveals cards from the top of his or her library until the named card is revealed. If it is, that player puts the rest of the revealed cards into his or her graveyard and puts the named card on top of his or her library. Otherwise, the player shuffles his or her library.
trans-unit.target: 说出一个牌名。 目标牌手从其牌库顶开始展示牌，直到他展示出此名称的牌为止。 若展示出该牌，则该牌手将其它展示的牌置于其坟墓场，并将该牌置于其牌库顶。 若未展示出该牌，则该牌手将其牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·73 | Vedalken Dismisser | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Vedalken Dismisser
trans-unit.target: 维多肯退散师

trans-unit.resname: RAV·73 | Vedalken Dismisser | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, put target creature on top of its owner's library.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，将目标生物置于其拥有者的牌库顶。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·73 | Vedalken Dismisser | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I crept up on him, quiet as a guttermouse. And then suddenly I found myself facedown in a latrine pit behind Tin Street Market."\n—Sirislav, Dimir spy
trans-unit.target: 「我像只耗子般偷偷摸摸爬到他头顶上； 然后突然间，我就脸朝下躺在锡街市场后面的屎坑里面。」 ～底密尔间谍稀斯拉夫

trans-unit.resname: RAV·74 | Vedalken Entrancer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Vedalken Entrancer
trans-unit.target: 维多肯迷幻术士

trans-unit.resname: RAV·74 | Vedalken Entrancer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {U}, {T}: Target player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
trans-unit.target: {U}，{T}：目标牌手将他牌库顶的两张牌置入其坟墓场。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·74 | Vedalken Entrancer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Their denial reaches far into your future.
trans-unit.target: 他们连你的未来都全盘否定。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·75 | Wizened Snitches | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wizened Snitches
trans-unit.target: 老年告密客

trans-unit.resname: RAV·75 | Wizened Snitches | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: RAV·75 | Wizened Snitches | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Players play with the top card of their libraries revealed.
trans-unit.target: 牌手以展示牌库顶牌的方式进行游戏。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·75 | Wizened Snitches | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Be careful what information you ask them to find, for it will likely be the subject of tale time at the alehouse."\n—Sirislav, Dimir spy
trans-unit.target: 「对你要他们去找的情报该更加小心，因为那最容易成为酒馆的热门故事。」 ～底密尔间谍稀斯拉夫

trans-unit.resname: RAV·76 | Zephyr Spirit | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Zephyr Spirit
trans-unit.target: 轻纱精怪

trans-unit.resname: RAV·76 | Zephyr Spirit | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME blocks, return it to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进行阻挡时，将它移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·76 | Zephyr Spirit | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: A spiteful force exists on Ravnica that binds these ghosts to the land of the living but forbids them to touch it.
trans-unit.target: 拉尼卡的某个恶毒势力将这些鬼魂束缚在充满生灵的大地，却又禁止他们与之碰触。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·77 | Blood Funnel | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Blood Funnel
trans-unit.target: 血腥蓄势

trans-unit.resname: RAV·77 | Blood Funnel | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Noncreature spells you play cost {2} less to play.
trans-unit.target: 你使用的非生物咒语费用减少{2}来使用。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·77 | Blood Funnel | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever you play a noncreature spell, counter that spell unless you sacrifice a creature.
trans-unit.target: 每当你使用了任一非生物的咒语时，除非你牺牲一个生物，否则反击该咒语。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·78 | Brainspoil | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Brainspoil
trans-unit.target: 坏脑咒

trans-unit.resname: RAV·78 | Brainspoil | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy target creature that isn't enchanted. It can't be regenerated.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标未被结附的生物。 它不能重生。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·78 | Brainspoil | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Transmute {1}{B}{B} ({1}{B}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same converted mana cost as this card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. Play only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 易质{1}{B}{B}（{1}{B}{B}，弃掉此牌：从你的牌库中搜寻一张总法术力费用与它相同的牌，展示该牌，并置于你手上。 然后将你的牌库洗牌。 使用的时机视同法术。）

trans-unit.resname: RAV·79 | Carrion Howler | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Carrion Howler
trans-unit.target: 腐肉嚎狼

trans-unit.resname: RAV·79 | Carrion Howler | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Pay 1 life: CARDNAME gets +2/-1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 支付1点生命：CARDNAME得+2/-1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·79 | Carrion Howler | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: They chase tirelessly after the bone-carts that speed along the streets of the Plague Quarter.
trans-unit.target: 板车自疫病区的街道呼啸而过，嚎狼在后方死命紧追。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·80 | Clinging Darkness | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Clinging Darkness
trans-unit.target: 黑暗紧缠

trans-unit.resname: RAV·80 | Clinging Darkness | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature
trans-unit.target: 生物结界

trans-unit.resname: RAV·80 | Clinging Darkness | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature gets -4/-1.
trans-unit.target: 受此结界的生物得-4/-1。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·80 | Clinging Darkness | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: There's an experience worse than blindness—it's the certainty that your vision is perfect and the horror that there's no world around you to see.
trans-unit.target: 有种感觉比盲目更可怕～你明知自己视力如常，却依旧什么也看不见。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·81 | Dark Confidant | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dark Confidant
trans-unit.target: 黑暗亲信

trans-unit.resname: RAV·81 | Dark Confidant | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You lose life equal to its converted mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，展示你的牌库顶牌，并将该牌置于你手上。 你失去与该牌之总法术力费用等量的生命。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·81 | Dark Confidant | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Greatness, at any cost.
trans-unit.target: 追求卓越，不计代价。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·82 | Darkblast | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Darkblast
trans-unit.target: 黑暗冲击波

trans-unit.resname: RAV·82 | Darkblast | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得-1/-1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·82 | Darkblast | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Dredge 3 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly three cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)
trans-unit.target: 发掘3（若你将抓一张牌，则你可以改为将你牌库顶正好三张牌置入你的坟墓场。 若你如此作，则将此牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。 若否，则抓一张牌。）

trans-unit.resname: RAV·83 | Dimir House Guard | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dimir House Guard
trans-unit.target: 底密尔会堂守卫

trans-unit.resname: RAV·83 | Dimir House Guard | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Fear
trans-unit.target: 恐惧

trans-unit.resname: RAV·83 | Dimir House Guard | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Sacrifice a creature: Regenerate CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个生物：重生CARDNAME。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·83 | Dimir House Guard | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Transmute {1}{B}{B} ({1}{B}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same converted mana cost as this card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. Play only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 易质{1}{B}{B}（{1}{B}{B}，弃掉此牌：从你的牌库中搜寻一张总法术力费用与它相同的牌，展示该牌，并置于你手上。 然后将你的牌库洗牌。 使用的时机视同法术。）

trans-unit.resname: RAV·84 | Dimir Machinations | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dimir Machinations
trans-unit.target: 底密尔图谋

trans-unit.resname: RAV·84 | Dimir Machinations | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Look at the top three cards of target player's library. Remove any number of those cards from the game, then put the rest back in any order.
trans-unit.target: 检视目标牌手牌库顶的三张牌。 将这些牌中任意数量的牌移出对战，其余则以任意顺序放回。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·84 | Dimir Machinations | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Transmute {1}{B}{B} ({1}{B}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same converted mana cost as this card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. Play only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 易质{1}{B}{B}（{1}{B}{B}，弃掉此牌：从你的牌库中搜寻一张总法术力费用与它相同的牌，展示该牌，并置于你手上。 然后将你的牌库洗牌。 使用的时机视同法术。）

trans-unit.resname: RAV·85 | Disembowel | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Disembowel
trans-unit.target: 开膛剖腹

trans-unit.resname: RAV·85 | Disembowel | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy target creature with converted mana cost X.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标总法术力费用为X的生物。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·85 | Disembowel | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "We thought we found the victim's clothes lumped in the street. As it turned out, it *was* the victim, insides sucked out—just a sack of skin and robes."\n—Agrus Kos
trans-unit.target: 「我们以为丢弃在街上的那堆是受害者的衣物。 结果，那就是受害者～只剩堆皮与外袍。」 ～阿固‧寇斯

trans-unit.resname: RAV·86 | Empty the Catacombs | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Empty the Catacombs
trans-unit.target: 腾空墓穴

trans-unit.source: "Riftcutters are suicidal anarchists, waving those lightning axes around so much that the walls are as likely to fall as their foes."\n—Heruj, Selesnya initiate
trans-unit.target: 「裂岩人是群不要命的捣乱份子；遇敌时总是闪电斧一阵乱挥，搞得到处断垣残壁。」 ～瑟雷尼亚新手荷路杰

trans-unit.resname: RAV·115 | Blockbuster | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Blockbuster
trans-unit.target: 巨型炸弹

trans-unit.resname: RAV·115 | Blockbuster | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}{R}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: CARDNAME deals 3 damage to each tapped creature and each player.
trans-unit.target: {1}{R}，牺牲CARDNAME：CARDNAME对每个已横置的生物和每位牌手造成3点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·115 | Blockbuster | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Vendors hung cords heavy with roots and laid out boxes of salted meat, unaware of the fiery disaster swiftly approaching.
trans-unit.target: 商贩还忙着张罗店面、摆出一箱箱腌肉，完全不知道凶恶的灾难已直扑而来。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·116 | Breath of Fury | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Breath of Fury
trans-unit.target: 怒火气息

trans-unit.resname: RAV·116 | Breath of Fury | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature you control
trans-unit.target: 生物结界（仅限由你操控的生物）

trans-unit.resname: RAV·116 | Breath of Fury | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When enchanted creature deals combat damage to a player, sacrifice it and attach CARDNAME to a creature you control. If you do, untap all creatures you control and after this phase, there is an additional combat phase.
trans-unit.target: 每当受此结界的生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，牺牲该生物，并将CARDNAME结附在由你操控的一个生物上。 若你如此作，则重置所有由你操控的生物，且在此阶段后，额外多出一个战斗阶段。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·117 | Char | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Char
trans-unit.target: 烤焦

trans-unit.resname: RAV·117 | Char | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 4 damage to target creature or player and 2 damage to you.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对目标生物或牌手造成4点伤害，且对你造成2点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·117 | Char | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Izzet mages often acquire their magic reagents from dubious sources, so the potency of their spells is never predictable.
trans-unit.target: 伊捷公会的法师所用的施法材料经常是从奇怪的管道取得，所以其咒语的成效从来无法预料。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·118 | Cleansing Beam | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Cleansing Beam
trans-unit.target: 净化光束

trans-unit.resname: RAV·118 | Cleansing Beam | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Radiance CARDNAME deals 2 damage to target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it.
trans-unit.target: 辉耀～CARDNAME对目标生物和每个与该生物有共通颜色的其它生物造成2点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·118 | Cleansing Beam | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Justice is toothless without punishment. Righteousness cannot succeed without the suffering of the guilty."\n—Razia
trans-unit.target: 「欲扬善必先惩恶。 若不让恶人受苦，正义定难伸张。」 ～拉基雅

trans-unit.resname: RAV·119 | Coalhauler Swine | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Coalhauler Swine
trans-unit.target: 负煤猪

trans-unit.resname: RAV·119 | Coalhauler Swine | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to each player.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME受到伤害时，它对每位牌手造成等量的伤害。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·119 | Coalhauler Swine | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Nothing stops industry in Ravnica—certainly not the safety of its workers.
trans-unit.target: 什么都挡不住拉尼卡的工业进展～更别说其工人的安全问题。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·120 | Dogpile | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dogpile
trans-unit.target: 围扑

trans-unit.resname: RAV·120 | Dogpile | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals damage to target creature or player equal to the number of attacking creatures you control.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对目标生物或牌手造成伤害，其数量等同于由你操控且进行攻击的生物之数量。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·120 | Dogpile | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: There is no shelter from this storm, its rain of fists, or the thunderous cackles of bloodlust.
trans-unit.target: 杀声震天，拳如雨下，无可遁逃。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·121 | Excruciator | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Excruciator
trans-unit.target: 拷打者

trans-unit.resname: RAV·121 | Excruciator | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Damage that would be dealt by CARDNAME can't be prevented.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME所造成的伤害不能被防止。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·121 | Excruciator | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Though used as a piercing weapon, the tusk is more akin to a stinger, spreading pain instantly throughout the body of its victim. This specimen deserves further study."\n—Simic research notes
trans-unit.target: 「虽然是拿来当穿刺式武器，那根长角还是比较接近刺针，让苦痛感立刻散布受害者全身。 此样本值得未来深入研究。」 ～析米克研究纪录

trans-unit.resname: RAV·122 | Fiery Conclusion | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Fiery Conclusion
trans-unit.target: 暴烈终局

trans-unit.resname: RAV·122 | Fiery Conclusion | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to play CARDNAME, sacrifice a creature.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个生物，以作为使用CARDNAME的额外费用。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·122 | Fiery Conclusion | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 5 damage to target creature.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对目标生物造成5点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·122 | Fiery Conclusion | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Boros legionnaire saw a noble sacrifice, the Rakdos thug a blazing suicide, and the Izzet alchemist an experiment gone awry.
trans-unit.target: 波洛斯军团兵见证了高贵的牺牲，拉铎司刺客看到了眩目的自杀场面，伊捷炼金术士则认为是实验出了差错。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·123 | Flame Fusillade | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Flame Fusillade
trans-unit.target: 火力齐发

trans-unit.resname: RAV·123 | Flame Fusillade | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Until end of turn, permanents you control gain "{T}: This permanent deals 1 damage to target creature or player."
trans-unit.target: 直到回合结束，由你操控的永久物获得「{T}：此永久物对目标生物或牌手造成1点伤害。」

trans-unit.resname: RAV·123 | Flame Fusillade | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "A single item acting as lantern and lance? Now *that's* military efficiency."\n—Brev Grezar, Boros lieutenant
trans-unit.target: 「既能当灯又能当矛的装备？ 这就是所谓的军事效率。」 ～波洛斯尉官布瑞‧葛札

trans-unit.resname: RAV·124 | Flash Conscription | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Flash Conscription
trans-unit.target: 快速征召

trans-unit.resname: RAV·124 | Flash Conscription | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Untap target creature and gain control of it until end of turn. That creature gains haste until end of turn. If {W} was spent to play CARDNAME, the creature gains "Whenever this creature deals combat damage, you gain that much life" until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 重置目标生物并获得其操控权直到回合结束。 该生物获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。 若你使用CARDNAME时支付了{W}，则该生物获得「每当此生物造成战斗伤害时，你获得等量的生命」直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·125 | Frenzied Goblin | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Frenzied Goblin
trans-unit.target: 狂热精灵

trans-unit.resname: RAV·125 | Frenzied Goblin | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, you may pay {R}. If you do, target creature can't block this turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，你可以支付{R}。 若你如此作，则目标生物本回合不能进行阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·125 | Frenzied Goblin | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The upside to not thinking about the consequences is that you'll always surprise those who do.
trans-unit.target: 不考虑后果的好处，就是爱考虑的人永远猜不透你。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·126 | Galvanic Arc | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Galvanic Arc
trans-unit.target: 电流弧光

trans-unit.resname: RAV·126 | Galvanic Arc | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature
trans-unit.target: 生物结界

trans-unit.resname: RAV·126 | Galvanic Arc | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, it deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，它对目标生物或牌手造成3点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·126 | Galvanic Arc | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature has first strike.
trans-unit.target: 受此结界的生物具有先攻异能。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·127 | Goblin Fire Fiend | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Goblin Fire Fiend
trans-unit.target: 纵火精灵

trans-unit.resname: RAV·127 | Goblin Fire Fiend | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Haste
trans-unit.target: 敏捷

trans-unit.resname: RAV·127 | Goblin Fire Fiend | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Defending player blocks CARDNAME if able.
trans-unit.target: 防御牌手若能阻挡CARDNAME，则必须阻挡之。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·127 | Goblin Fire Fiend | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {R}: CARDNAME gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {R}：CARDNAME得+1/+0直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·128 | Goblin Spelunkers | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Goblin Spelunkers
trans-unit.target: 精灵探窟员

trans-unit.resname: RAV·128 | Goblin Spelunkers | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Mountainwalk
trans-unit.target: 山脉行者

trans-unit.resname: RAV·128 | Goblin Spelunkers | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Chimney sweeps, explorers of abandoned buildings, spire climbers . . . goblin spelunkers have found countless niches within Ravnica's metropolis.
trans-unit.target: 清扫烟囱，探寻废屋，攀爬高塔. . . 精灵探窟员在拉尼卡的大都会有太多合适的职务。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·129 | Greater Forgeling | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Greater Forgeling
trans-unit.target: 高等锻火妖

trans-unit.resname: RAV·129 | Greater Forgeling | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}{R}: CARDNAME gets +3/-3 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {1}{R}：CARDNAME得+3/-3直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·129 | Greater Forgeling | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Few have seen the inner workings of Ravnica's furnaces, but neighboring districts catch brief glimpses in the horrors that escape the flames.
trans-unit.target: 很少有人见过拉尼卡锻冶炉内部的运作状况，但附近的城区曾看到自火焰窜出的恐怖身影一闪而过。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·130 | Hammerfist Giant | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Hammerfist Giant
trans-unit.target: 锤拳巨人

trans-unit.resname: RAV·130 | Hammerfist Giant | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: CARDNAME deals 4 damage to each creature without flying and each player.
trans-unit.target: {T}：CARDNAME对每个不具飞行异能的生物和每位牌手造成4点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·130 | Hammerfist Giant | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Oh sure, they buy a lot of ale, but I always find myself needing to rebuild after the giants have paid a visit."\n—Belko, owner of Titan's Keg tavern
trans-unit.target: 「没错啦，他们会买很多麦酒；但这些巨人每次光顾过后，我都得把房子重盖一次。」 ～泰坦酒桶旅店主人拜可

trans-unit.resname: RAV·131 | Hunted Dragon | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Hunted Dragon
trans-unit.target: 遭缉巨龙

trans-unit.resname: RAV·131 | Hunted Dragon | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying, haste
trans-unit.target: 飞行，敏捷

trans-unit.resname: RAV·131 | Hunted Dragon | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, put three 2/2 white Knight creature tokens with first strike into play under target opponent's control.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，将三个2/2白色，具先攻异能的骑士衍生物在目标对手的操控下放置进场。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·131 | Hunted Dragon | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The knights see a mighty quarry. The dragon sees breakfast, lunch, and dinner.
trans-unit.target: 骑士找到了强大的猎物； 龙则找到了早餐，午餐，与晚餐。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·132 | Incite Hysteria | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Incite Hysteria
trans-unit.target: 煽动歇斯底里

trans-unit.resname: RAV·132 | Incite Hysteria | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Radiance Creatures that share a color with target creature can't block this turn.
trans-unit.target: 辉耀～与目标生物有共通颜色的生物本回合不能进行阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·132 | Incite Hysteria | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The Boros say they want to bring order to Ravnica. Funny then, how well they use chaos."\n—Trigori, Azorius senator
trans-unit.target: 「波洛斯宣称要为拉尼卡带来秩序。 有趣的是，他们对运用混乱可在行得很。」 ～俄佐立参议员崔格瑞

trans-unit.resname: RAV·133 | Indentured Oaf | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Indentured Oaf
trans-unit.target: 卖身蠢货

trans-unit.resname: RAV·133 | Indentured Oaf | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Prevent all damage that CARDNAME would deal to red creatures.
trans-unit.target: 防止CARDNAME将对红色生物造成的所有伤害。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·133 | Indentured Oaf | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: All it knows is the difference between friend and food.
trans-unit.target: 他的脑袋只懂得一件事：如何分辨朋友跟食物。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·134 | Instill Furor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Instill Furor
trans-unit.target: 灌输狂热

trans-unit.resname: RAV·134 | Instill Furor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature
trans-unit.target: 生物结界

trans-unit.resname: RAV·134 | Instill Furor | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature has "At the end of your turn, sacrifice this creature unless it attacked this turn."
trans-unit.target: 受此结界的生物具有「在你的回合结束时，除非此生物于本回合中曾进行攻击，否则牺牲之。」

trans-unit.resname: RAV·134 | Instill Furor | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The Rakdos know little of technology, but they definitely know how to push buttons."\n—Trivaz, Izzet mage
trans-unit.target: 「拉铎司的人没什么技术可言，但他们可懂得如何按钮点火。」 ～伊捷法师崔瓦兹

trans-unit.resname: RAV·135 | Mindmoil | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mindmoil
trans-unit.target: 思绪翻搅

trans-unit.resname: RAV·135 | Mindmoil | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you play a spell, put the cards in your hand on the bottom of your library in any order, then draw that many cards.
trans-unit.target: 每当你使用咒语时，将你的手牌以任意顺序置于你的牌库底，然后抓等量的牌。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·135 | Mindmoil | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "My criticism of the Izzet is that their impulse for learning seems too much like impulse and too little like learning."\n—Trigori, Azorius senator
trans-unit.target: 「我对伊捷的评语，是他们的学习冲动太像是冲动，而太不像学习。」 ～俄佐立参议员崔格瑞

trans-unit.resname: RAV·136 | Molten Sentry | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Molten Sentry
trans-unit.target: 融铸哨兵

trans-unit.resname: RAV·136 | Molten Sentry | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME comes into play, flip a coin. If the coin comes up heads, CARDNAME comes into play as a 5/2 creature with haste. If it comes up tails, CARDNAME comes into play as a 2/5 creature with defender.
trans-unit.target: 于CARDNAME进场时，掷一枚硬币。 若是正面，则CARDNAME进场时为5/2，具敏捷异能的生物。 若是反面，则CARDNAME进场时为2/5，具守军异能的生物。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·136 | Molten Sentry | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Some take after their father, Stone, some after their mother, Fire.
trans-unit.target: 有些坚毅如其父，有些则暴烈如其母。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·137 | Ordruun Commando | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ordruun Commando
trans-unit.target: 欧度鲁突击兵

trans-unit.resname: RAV·137 | Ordruun Commando | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {W}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to CARDNAME this turn.
trans-unit.target: {W}：于本回合中，防止接下来将对CARDNAME造成的1点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·137 | Ordruun Commando | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Thick of muscle, stout of heart, and possessing a burning love of justice and the battlefield, the Ordruun minotaurs are the foundation of the Boros Legion.
trans-unit.target: 身形粗壮，心志坚强，酷爱正义与战场；欧度鲁牛头怪是波洛斯教团的础石。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·138 | Rain of Embers | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rain of Embers
trans-unit.target: 焰烬雨

trans-unit.resname: RAV·138 | Rain of Embers | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对每个生物和每位牌手造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·138 | Rain of Embers | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: There's plenty to talk about in the marketplaces of Ravnica, be it the latest feud between guilds or the terrible weather.
trans-unit.target: 拉尼卡的市集总有许多话题可谈，不管是公会间最新的联盟态势，或是糟糕透顶的天气。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·139 | Reroute | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Reroute
trans-unit.target: 重新定向

trans-unit.resname: RAV·139 | Reroute | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Change the target of target activated ability with a single target.
trans-unit.target: 为仅指定单一目标的目标起动式异能更改目标。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·139 | Reroute | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·139 | Reroute | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Three hundred years of practice thwarted by an instant of mischief.
trans-unit.target: 三百多年的修练，却因一瞬的恶意而挫败。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·140 | Sabertooth Alley Cat | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sabertooth Alley Cat
trans-unit.target: 剑齿流浪猫

trans-unit.resname: RAV·140 | Sabertooth Alley Cat | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME attacks each turn if able.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME每回合若能攻击，则必须攻击。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·140 | Sabertooth Alley Cat | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {1}{R}: Creatures without defender can't block CARDNAME this turn.
trans-unit.target: {1}{R}：本回合中，不具守军异能的生物不能阻挡CARDNAME。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·140 | Sabertooth Alley Cat | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: It has eight lives' worth of hunger to satisfy.
trans-unit.target: 他饿掉了快八条命。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·141 | Seismic Spike | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Seismic Spike
trans-unit.target: 局部地动

trans-unit.resname: RAV·141 | Seismic Spike | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy target land. Add {R}{R} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标地。 加{R}{R}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·141 | Seismic Spike | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Natural disasters in Ravnica are largely nullified by the Izzet. Unnatural disasters, on the other hand, happen all the time.
trans-unit.target: 伊捷大幅消减了拉尼卡的自然灾害。 不过，非自然的灾害却是随时发生。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·142 | Sell-Sword Brute | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sell-Sword Brute
trans-unit.target: 卖剑打手

trans-unit.resname: RAV·142 | Sell-Sword Brute | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME is put into a graveyard from play, it deals 2 damage to you.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME从场上进入坟墓场时，它对你造成2点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·142 | Sell-Sword Brute | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Killing is easy. Just wrap your hand around the haft, and wrap your enemy around the blade."
trans-unit.target: 「杀人还不简单； 只要用双手牢牢抓住剑柄，再用剑锋牢牢钉往敌人。」

trans-unit.resname: RAV·143 | Smash | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Smash
trans-unit.target: 破碎击

trans-unit.resname: RAV·143 | Smash | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy target artifact.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标神器。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·143 | Smash | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·143 | Smash | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Ravnica's laws protect not its citizens but its industry. Aging equipment is destroyed rather than restored, to bring more money into the factories' coffers.
trans-unit.target: 拉尼卡的法律是用来保护工业，而不是保护市民。 老旧的武具均应销毁而不予修复，如此才能充实工厂的金库。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·144 | Sparkmage Apprentice | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sparkmage Apprentice
trans-unit.target: 火花法师学徒

trans-unit.resname: RAV·144 | Sparkmage Apprentice | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, it deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，它对目标生物或牌手造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·144 | Sparkmage Apprentice | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Pajik was amazed and pleased at his newfound powers. His pet cat Rivin was slightly less enthusiastic.
trans-unit.target: 帕吉才刚发现自己有此潜力，因此雀跃不已； 而他养的猫瑞文则对此不太热中。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·145 | Stoneshaker Shaman | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Stoneshaker Shaman
trans-unit.target: 撼岩祭师

trans-unit.resname: RAV·145 | Stoneshaker Shaman | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the end of each player's turn, that player sacrifices an untapped land.
trans-unit.target: 在每位牌手的回合结束时，该牌手牺牲一个未横置的地。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·145 | Stoneshaker Shaman | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: There is no place in Ravnica for stagnation, no room for lands unfilled and untilled.
trans-unit.target: 拉尼卡容不下停顿迟滞，许不得土地闲置荒废。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·146 | Surge of Zeal | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Surge of Zeal
trans-unit.target: 狂热波涛

trans-unit.resname: RAV·146 | Surge of Zeal | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Radiance Target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it gain haste until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 辉耀～直到回合结束，目标生物和每个与该生物有共通颜色的其它生物获得敏捷异能。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·146 | Surge of Zeal | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "If only my poxes were as infectious as their zealotry."\n—Savra
trans-unit.target: 「真希望我毒疹的蔓延速度能比得上他们的狂热。」 ～撒芙儿

trans-unit.resname: RAV·147 | Torpid Moloch | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Torpid Moloch
trans-unit.target: 蛰伏棘蜥

trans-unit.resname: RAV·147 | Torpid Moloch | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
trans-unit.target: 守军（此生物不能攻击。）

trans-unit.resname: RAV·147 | Torpid Moloch | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Sacrifice three lands: CARDNAME loses defender until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲三个地：CARDNAME失去守军异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·147 | Torpid Moloch | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Market hucksters sell molochs for use as watchdogs. Of course, that's all molochs do. Sit around . . . and watch.
trans-unit.target: 市场小贩把棘蜥拿来当作守门狗来叫卖。 没错，这就是棘蜥最拿手的； 闲闲坐下. . . 然后看着。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·148 | Viashino Fangtail | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Viashino Fangtail
trans-unit.target: 尖尾凡尔西诺

trans-unit.resname: RAV·148 | Viashino Fangtail | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: CARDNAME deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
trans-unit.target: {T}：CARDNAME对目标生物或牌手造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·148 | Viashino Fangtail | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "When the bony terminus gets too large, it's shed from the tail in coinciding periods of heightened aggression and hunger."\n—Simic research notes
trans-unit.target: 「骨质末端会持续长大，最终从尾部落下；这与侵略性与饥饿感的周期高潮碰巧相符。」 ～析米克研究纪录

trans-unit.resname: RAV·149 | Viashino Slasher | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Viashino Slasher
trans-unit.target: 斩击凡尔西诺

trans-unit.resname: RAV·149 | Viashino Slasher | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {R}: CARDNAME gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {R}：CARDNAME得+1/-1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·149 | Viashino Slasher | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Citizens of Ravnica stick to the main streets. Shortcuts may look tempting, but down each alley, dozens of hungry hands await, and screams do not carry into the busy market throng.
trans-unit.target: 拉尼卡的市民只敢在大街活动。 虽然抄快捷方式总是令人跃跃欲试，但每条巷子里都有许多饥饿的手等着，而惨叫声根本传不进忙碌的市集人群。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·150 | Warp World | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Warp World
trans-unit.target: 歪曲世相

trans-unit.resname: RAV·150 | Warp World | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each player shuffles all permanents he or she owns into his or her library, then reveals that many cards from the top of his or her library. Each player puts all artifact, creature, and land cards revealed this way into play, then puts all enchantment cards revealed this way into play, then puts the rest on the bottom of his or her library in any order.
trans-unit.target: 每位牌手把由他拥有的所有永久物洗回其牌库，然后从其牌库顶展示等量的牌。 每位牌手把以此法展示的所有神器，生物，与地牌放置进场，然后把以此法展示的所有结界放置进场，然后将其余的牌以任意顺序置于其牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·151 | War-Torch Goblin | Card Name
trans-unit.source: War-Torch Goblin
trans-unit.target: 火炬精灵

trans-unit.resname: RAV·151 | War-Torch Goblin | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {R}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: CARDNAME deals 2 damage to target blocking creature.
trans-unit.target: {R}，牺牲CARDNAME：CARDNAME对目标进行阻挡的生物造成2点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·151 | War-Torch Goblin | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "In a town shaped by the subtle machinations and political intrigue of its guilds, it's reassuring to see a goblin waving his torch and screaming about some nonsense or other."\n—Agrus Kos
trans-unit.target: 「在充满了公会精妙图谋与政治策划的城镇中，能见到精灵挥舞火把、向同伴吼些蠢话，还真让心底踏实不少。」 ～阿固‧寇斯

trans-unit.resname: RAV·152 | Wojek Embermage | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wojek Embermage
trans-unit.target: 沃耶克烬法师

trans-unit.resname: RAV·152 | Wojek Embermage | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Radiance {T}: CARDNAME deals 1 damage to target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it.
trans-unit.target: 辉耀～{T}：CARDNAME对目标生物和每个与该生物有共通颜色的其它生物造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·152 | Wojek Embermage | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Your brother's crimes are your crimes. You stood by and lent support, so you too must face judgment."
trans-unit.target: 「你兄弟犯的罪也算是你的罪。 你站在旁边提供协助，所以你也得面对审判。」

trans-unit.resname: RAV·153 | Birds of Paradise | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Birds of Paradise
trans-unit.target: 天堂鸟

trans-unit.resname: RAV·153 | Birds of Paradise | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: RAV·153 | Birds of Paradise | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·153 | Birds of Paradise | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Long ago, birds of paradise littered the skies. Thanks to the city's sprawl, most now exist as pets of society's elite.
trans-unit.target: 很久以前，只要抬头张望就能见到天堂鸟。 但由于城市规模不断扩展，现在天堂鸟已成为社会菁英才拥有的宠物。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·154 | Bramble Elemental | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bramble Elemental
trans-unit.target: 竹元素

trans-unit.resname: RAV·154 | Bramble Elemental | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever an Aura becomes attached to CARDNAME, put two 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens into play.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一灵气新结附在CARDNAME上时，将两个1/1绿色的腐生物衍生物放置进场。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·154 | Bramble Elemental | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Ravnica is a seamless urban tapestry, each city bleeding into the next. In abandoned corners, however, nature has begun to reclaim what it once owned.
trans-unit.target: 拉尼卡就像是幅没接缝的都市织锦，城市之间没有任何分界。 但在无人闻问的角落中，大自然已开始索回自己原有之物。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·155 | Carven Caryatid | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Carven Caryatid
trans-unit.target: 女雕像柱

trans-unit.resname: RAV·155 | Carven Caryatid | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
trans-unit.target: 守军（此生物不能攻击。）

trans-unit.resname: RAV·155 | Carven Caryatid | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·155 | Carven Caryatid | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: So-called "old wood" is rare in deforested Ravnica. Statues carved from it are said to house the last of the ancient nature spirits.
trans-unit.target: 由于过度采伐之故，所谓的「老树」在拉尼卡已经十分罕见。 据说以老树雕成的像，是用来让仅存的古老自然精怪有歇息之处。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·156 | Chord of Calling | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Chord of Calling
trans-unit.target: 和声召集

trans-unit.resname: RAV·156 | Chord of Calling | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Convoke (Each creature you tap while playing this spell reduces its cost by {1} or by one mana of that creature's color.)
trans-unit.target: 召集（使用此咒语时，你每为它横置一个生物，便可以少支付{1}，或一点所横置生物颜色的法术力。）

trans-unit.resname: RAV·156 | Chord of Calling | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Search your library for a creature card with converted mana cost X or less and put it into play. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 从你的牌库中搜寻一张总法术力费用小于或等于X的生物牌，并将它放置进场。 然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·157 | Civic Wayfinder | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Civic Wayfinder
trans-unit.target: 城市引路人

trans-unit.resname: RAV·157 | Civic Wayfinder | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，你可以从你的牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，展示该牌，并将它置入你手上。 若你如此作，则将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·157 | Civic Wayfinder | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "These alleys are not safe. Come, I can guide you back to the market square."
trans-unit.target: 「这巷子不太安全。 跟我来，我可以领你走回市集广场。」

trans-unit.resname: RAV·158 | Doubling Season | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Doubling Season
trans-unit.target: 倍产旺季

trans-unit.resname: RAV·158 | Doubling Season | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If an effect would put one or more tokens into play under your control, it puts twice that many into play instead.
trans-unit.target: 若任一效应将把一个或数个衍生物放置进场并由你操控，则改为将两倍数量的衍生物放置进场。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·158 | Doubling Season | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: If an effect would place one or more counters on a permanent you control, it places twice that many on that permanent instead.
trans-unit.target: 若任一效应将在由你操控的永久物上放置一个或数个指示物，则改为在该永久物上放置两倍数量的指示物。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·159 | Dowsing Shaman | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dowsing Shaman
trans-unit.target: 探源祭师

trans-unit.resname: RAV·159 | Dowsing Shaman | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {2}{G}, {T}: Return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: {2}{G}，{T}：将目标结界牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·159 | Dowsing Shaman | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: He combs the streets looking for the lost light, the discarded enigmas of the city.
trans-unit.target: 他持杖划过大街小巷，探寻失落的光芒，城市遗弃的谜团。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·160 | Dryad's Caress | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dryad's Caress
trans-unit.target: 树灵抚慰

trans-unit.resname: RAV·160 | Dryad's Caress | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You gain 1 life for each creature in play. If {W} was spent to play CARDNAME, untap all creatures you control.
trans-unit.target: 每有一个生物在场，你便获得1点生命。 若你使用CARDNAME时支付了{W}，则重置所有由你操控的生物。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·160 | Dryad's Caress | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I awoke to the face of beauty, my body fully healed. In that moment I knew my destiny was the Conclave's to shape."\n—Rogad, Selesnya initiate
trans-unit.target: 「我在美丽面容的关怀下醒来，身体完全复原。 就在那一刻，我把命运献给了盟会。」 ～瑟雷尼亚新手洛加

trans-unit.resname: RAV·161 | Elves of Deep Shadow | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Elves of Deep Shadow
trans-unit.target: 深黯地精

trans-unit.resname: RAV·161 | Elves of Deep Shadow | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool. CARDNAME deals 1 damage to you.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{B}到你的法术力池中。 CARDNAME对你造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·161 | Elves of Deep Shadow | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Cast out of the Conclave generations ago, these elves found a home in the corrupted districts of the Golgari.
trans-unit.target: 这群地精早在数代以前便被逐出盟会，之后将葛加理的腐化城区当成家园。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·162 | Elvish Skysweeper | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Elvish Skysweeper
trans-unit.target: 荡空地精

trans-unit.resname: RAV·162 | Elvish Skysweeper | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {4}{G}, Sacrifice a creature: Destroy target creature with flying.
trans-unit.target: {4}{G}，牺牲一个生物：消灭目标具飞行异能的生物。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·162 | Elvish Skysweeper | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The spires of Ravnica are no different from the tall trees of other planes. The elves navigate and protect them just the same.
trans-unit.target: 拉尼卡的高塔就如其它时空的高大树木一般， 需要地精来引导与照护。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·163 | Farseek | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Farseek
trans-unit.target: 远眺

trans-unit.resname: RAV·163 | Farseek | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Search your library for a Plains, Island, Swamp, or Mountain card and put it into play tapped. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 从你的牌库中搜寻一张平原或海岛或沼泽或山脉牌，并将它横置进场。 然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·163 | Farseek | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "How truly vast this city must be, that I have traveled so far and seen so much, yet never once found the place where the buildings fail."
trans-unit.target: 「这城市究竟广大到什么地步呢？我已旅行了那么远，看了那么多，却还没找到毫无建物的地方。」

trans-unit.resname: RAV·164 | Fists of Ironwood | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Fists of Ironwood
trans-unit.target: 铁木拳

trans-unit.resname: RAV·164 | Fists of Ironwood | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature
trans-unit.target: 生物结界

trans-unit.resname: RAV·164 | Fists of Ironwood | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, put two 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens into play.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，将两个1/1绿色的腐生物衍生物放置进场。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·164 | Fists of Ironwood | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature has trample.
trans-unit.target: 受此结界的生物具有践踏异能。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·164 | Fists of Ironwood | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Saprolings add the three and the four to the "one-two punch."
trans-unit.target: 连续重击之后，腐生物再补个两拳。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·165 | Gather Courage | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gather Courage
trans-unit.target: 鼓舞勇气

trans-unit.resname: RAV·165 | Gather Courage | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Convoke (Each creature you tap while playing this spell reduces its cost by {1} or by one mana of that creature's color.)
trans-unit.target: 召集（使用此咒语时，你每为它横置一个生物，便可以少支付{1}，或一点所横置生物颜色的法术力。）

trans-unit.resname: RAV·165 | Gather Courage | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得+2/+2直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·166 | Golgari Brownscale | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Golgari Brownscale
trans-unit.target: 葛加理棕鳞兽

trans-unit.resname: RAV·166 | Golgari Brownscale | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME is put into your hand from your graveyard, you gain 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME从你的坟墓场置入你手上时，你获得2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·166 | Golgari Brownscale | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Dredge 2 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly two cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)
trans-unit.target: 发掘2（若你将抓一张牌，则你可以改为将你牌库顶正好两张牌置入你的坟墓场。 若你如此作，则将此牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。 若否，则抓一张牌。）

trans-unit.resname: RAV·167 | Golgari Grave-Troll | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Golgari Grave-Troll
trans-unit.target: 葛加理墓地巨魔

trans-unit.resname: RAV·167 | Golgari Grave-Troll | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME comes into play with a +1/+1 counter on it for each creature card in your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进场时上面有数个+1/+1指示物，其数量等同于你坟墓场中的生物牌数量。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·167 | Golgari Grave-Troll | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from CARDNAME: Regenerate CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: {1}，从CARDNAME上移去一个+1/+1指示物：重生CARDNAME。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·167 | Golgari Grave-Troll | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Dredge 6
trans-unit.target: 发掘6

trans-unit.resname: RAV·168 | Goliath Spider | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Goliath Spider
trans-unit.target: 巨硕蜘蛛

trans-unit.resname: RAV·168 | Goliath Spider | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can block as though it had flying.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME能视同具有飞行异能地进行阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·168 | Goliath Spider | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The glittering strands of its complex web catch everything from a buzzing gnat to a passing bloatdrake.
trans-unit.target: 这张天网的闪亮丝线能缠住任何东西，从嗡嗡作响的蚊虫到粗心大意的龙兽。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·169 | Greater Mossdog | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Greater Mossdog
trans-unit.target: 高等苔藓犬

trans-unit.resname: RAV·169 | Greater Mossdog | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Dredge 3 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly three cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)
trans-unit.target: 发掘3（若你将抓一张牌，则你可以改为将你牌库顶正好三张牌置入你的坟墓场。 若你如此作，则将此牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。 若否，则抓一张牌。）

trans-unit.resname: RAV·169 | Greater Mossdog | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Man's best fungus.
trans-unit.target: 人类最绿的朋友。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·170 | Hunted Troll | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Hunted Troll
trans-unit.target: 遭缉巨魔

trans-unit.resname: RAV·170 | Hunted Troll | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, put four 1/1 blue Faerie creature tokens with flying into play under target opponent's control.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，将四个1/1蓝色，具飞行异能的仙灵衍生物在目标对手的操控下放置进场。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·170 | Hunted Troll | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {G}: Regenerate CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: {G}：重生CARDNAME。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·171 | Ivy Dancer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ivy Dancer
trans-unit.target: 长春藤舞者

trans-unit.resname: RAV·171 | Ivy Dancer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Target creature gains forestwalk until end of turn.

trans-unit.source: Search your library for up to three creature cards and reveal them. Shuffle your library, then put those cards on top of it in any order.
trans-unit.target: 从你的牌库中搜寻至多三张生物牌并展示之。 将你的牌库洗牌，然后将它们以任意顺序置于你的牌库顶。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·198 | Congregation at Dawn | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "It is fitting that we meet in the first hour of light, for we are called by the Conclave to pierce a threat of darkness."
trans-unit.target: 「于晨光方始之刻会面真是再适合不过了，因为盟会正是为了克服黑暗的威胁而召集我们。」

trans-unit.resname: RAV·199 | Consult the Necrosages | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Consult the Necrosages
trans-unit.target: 请示死冥贤者

trans-unit.resname: RAV·199 | Consult the Necrosages | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose one Target player draws two cards; or target player discards two cards.
trans-unit.target: 选择一项～目标牌手抓两张牌；或目标牌手弃两张牌。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·199 | Consult the Necrosages | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Dimir rank and file never see nor hear their guildmaster. All orders are given through mysterious necrosages who appear from the shadows, tersely toss out a command, and then melt into the darkness.
trans-unit.target: 底密尔公会没人见过首领，也没人听过首领的声音。 所有命令都透过死冥贤者传达；他们总在阴影中现身，简洁地交代命令，然后融入黑暗而去。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·200 | Dark Heart of the Wood | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dark Heart of the Wood
trans-unit.target: 密林黯心

trans-unit.resname: RAV·200 | Dark Heart of the Wood | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Sacrifice a Forest: You gain 3 life.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个树林：你获得3点生命。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·200 | Dark Heart of the Wood | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The soil here is rich with the rotting dead, and the sun's fingers barely penetrate the dark canopy. Plant our brethren here. This shall be our sanctuary."\n—Savra
trans-unit.target: 「此地土壤富含腐尸养分，并且阳光少有机会穿透黑暗林冠。 在此让兄弟们生长吧； 此处将成为我辈之圣殿。」 ～撒芙儿

trans-unit.resname: RAV·201 | Dimir Cutpurse | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dimir Cutpurse
trans-unit.target: 底密尔扒手

trans-unit.resname: RAV·201 | Dimir Cutpurse | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card and you draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME对牌手造成战斗伤害时，该牌手弃一张牌，并且你抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·201 | Dimir Cutpurse | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Other guilds demand tolls from those who travel their territories, but not House Dimir. It takes its share secretly, one coin purse at a time.
trans-unit.target: 每个公会都向地盘上的旅人征收过路费，底密尔会堂却是个例外。 它们总暗地里索取应得的款项，每个钱包一次拿一枚硬币。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·202 | Dimir Doppelganger | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dimir Doppelganger
trans-unit.target: 底密尔化妖

trans-unit.resname: RAV·202 | Dimir Doppelganger | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}{U}{B}: Remove target creature card in a graveyard from the game. CARDNAME becomes a copy of that card and gains this ability.
trans-unit.target: {1}{U}{B}：将目标生物牌从任一坟墓场移出对战。 CARDNAME成为该牌的复制，并获得此异能。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·202 | Dimir Doppelganger | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Fear not. Your life will not go unlived."
trans-unit.target: 「别怕。 妳的一生并没白活。」

trans-unit.resname: RAV·203 | Dimir Infiltrator | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dimir Infiltrator
trans-unit.target: 底密尔渗透者

trans-unit.resname: RAV·203 | Dimir Infiltrator | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME is unblockable.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME不能被阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·203 | Dimir Infiltrator | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Transmute {1}{U}{B} ({1}{U}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same converted mana cost as this card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. Play only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 易质{1}{U}{B}（{1}{U}{B}，弃掉此牌：从你的牌库中搜寻一张总法术力费用与它相同的牌，展示该牌，并置于你手上。 然后将你的牌库洗牌。 使用的时机视同法术。）

trans-unit.resname: RAV·204 | Drooling Groodion | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Drooling Groodion
trans-unit.target: 垂涎古汀兽

trans-unit.resname: RAV·204 | Drooling Groodion | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {2}{B}{G}, Sacrifice a creature: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Another target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {2}{B}{G}，牺牲一个生物：目标生物得+2/+2直到回合结束。 另一个目标生物得-2/-2直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·204 | Drooling Groodion | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The Golgari expand, yes, but I refuse to call their tainted creations 'growth.'"\n—Veszka, Selesnya evangel
trans-unit.target: 「葛加理的势力扩张了；没错，我拒绝把「成长」两字用在那批脏东西上面。」 ～瑟雷尼亚福音师薇兹卡

trans-unit.resname: RAV·205 | Firemane Angel | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Firemane Angel
trans-unit.target: 炎鬃天使

trans-unit.resname: RAV·205 | Firemane Angel | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying, first strike
trans-unit.target: 飞行，先攻

trans-unit.resname: RAV·205 | Firemane Angel | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, if CARDNAME is in your graveyard or in play, you may gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，若CARDNAME在你的坟墓场或场上，则你可以获得1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·205 | Firemane Angel | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {6}{R}{R}{W}{W}: Return CARDNAME from your graveyard to play. Play this ability only during your upkeep.
trans-unit.target: {6}{R}{R}{W}{W}：将CARDNAME从你的坟墓场移回场上。 你只可以于你的维持中使用此异能。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·206 | Flame-Kin Zealot | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Flame-Kin Zealot
trans-unit.target: 炎身狂信者

trans-unit.resname: RAV·206 | Flame-Kin Zealot | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain haste until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，由你操控的生物得+1/+1并获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·206 | Flame-Kin Zealot | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Boros soldiers are like a cache of bombs ready to explode, and the flame-kin light their fuses.
trans-unit.target: 波洛斯士兵就像堆满仓库的炸药，炎身则能点燃其引信。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·207 | Glare of Subdual | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Glare of Subdual
trans-unit.target: 威压强光

trans-unit.resname: RAV·207 | Glare of Subdual | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Tap an untapped creature you control: Tap target artifact or creature.
trans-unit.target: 横置一个由你操控且未横置的生物：横置目标神器或生物。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·207 | Glare of Subdual | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The righteous light of Selesnya is channeled through the devout, striking out to blind the nonbelievers.
trans-unit.target: 瑟雷尼亚的虔诚心志转化为四射正义光芒，令异教徒为之瞽目。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·208 | Glimpse the Unthinkable | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Glimpse the Unthinkable
trans-unit.target: 瞥视恶念

trans-unit.resname: RAV·208 | Glimpse the Unthinkable | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target player puts the top ten cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手将其牌库顶的十张牌置入其坟墓场。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·208 | Glimpse the Unthinkable | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I am confident that if anyone actually penetrates our facades, even the most perceptive would still be fundamentally unprepared for the truth of House Dimir."\n—Szadek
trans-unit.target: 「我敢说，若是真有人能透视我们的心思，就算他理解力再强，也将完全无法承受底密尔会堂背后的真相。」 ～札戴克

trans-unit.resname: RAV·209 | Golgari Germination | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Golgari Germination
trans-unit.target: 葛加理式萌生

trans-unit.resname: RAV·209 | Golgari Germination | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a nontoken creature you control is put into a graveyard from play, put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token into play.
trans-unit.target: 每当由你操控的一个非衍生物的生物从场上进入坟墓场时，将一个1/1绿色的腐生物衍生物放置进场。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·209 | Golgari Germination | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Golgari don't bury their dead. They plant them.
trans-unit.target: 葛加理的成员从不埋葬亡者。 那是拿来种的。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·210 | Golgari Rotwurm | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Golgari Rotwurm
trans-unit.target: 葛加理腐尸亚龙

trans-unit.resname: RAV·210 | Golgari Rotwurm | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target player loses 1 life.
trans-unit.target: {B}，牺牲一个生物：目标牌手失去1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·210 | Golgari Rotwurm | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Like corpse-worms through a carapace, rotwurms slide through the hollowed bones of the undercity.
trans-unit.target: 腐尸亚龙在地底城的空心骨架间穿梭，就像蛆虫穿过甲壳一样。

trans-unit.target: 铭壳圣甲虫
