trans-unit.target: 发掘1（若你将抓一张牌，则你可以改为将你牌库顶正好一张牌置入你的坟墓场。 若你如此作，则将此牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。 若否，则抓一张牌。）

trans-unit.resname: RAV·212 | Guardian of Vitu-Ghazi | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Guardian of Vitu-Ghazi
trans-unit.target: 维图加基守护者

trans-unit.resname: RAV·212 | Guardian of Vitu-Ghazi | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Convoke (Each creature you tap while playing this spell reduces its cost by {1} or by one mana of that creature's color.)
trans-unit.target: 召集（使用此咒语时，你每为它横置一个生物，便可以少支付{1}，或一点所横置生物颜色的法术力。）

trans-unit.resname: RAV·212 | Guardian of Vitu-Ghazi | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Vigilance
trans-unit.target: 警戒

trans-unit.resname: RAV·212 | Guardian of Vitu-Ghazi | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: It stands sentinel to the great City-Tree, home of the Selesnya Conclave.
trans-unit.target: 他是伟大树都的守卫，维护瑟雷尼亚盟会的安全。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·213 | Lightning Helix | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Lightning Helix
trans-unit.target: 闪电螺旋

trans-unit.resname: RAV·213 | Lightning Helix | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 3 damage to target creature or player and you gain 3 life.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对目标生物或牌手造成3点伤害，且你获得3点生命。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·213 | Lightning Helix | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Though less well-known than its army of soldiers, the Boros Legion's mage-priests are as respected by the innocent as they are hated by the ghosts of the guilty.
trans-unit.target: 虽然波洛斯教团是以士兵的实力而闻名，但其麾下的法师僧侣也同样受善人敬重，遭恶徒憎厌。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·214 | Loxodon Hierarch | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Loxodon Hierarch
trans-unit.target: 象族大主教

trans-unit.resname: RAV·214 | Loxodon Hierarch | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, you gain 4 life.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，你获得4点生命。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·214 | Loxodon Hierarch | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {G}{W}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Regenerate each creature you control.
trans-unit.target: {G}{W}，牺牲CARDNAME：重生由你操控的所有生物。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·214 | Loxodon Hierarch | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I have lived long, and I remember how this city once was. If my death serves to bring back the Ravnica in my memory, then so be it."
trans-unit.target: 「我活了那么久，也还能记得这城市过去的样子。 若我的死能让拉尼卡回复心中旧貌，就这么作吧。」

trans-unit.resname: RAV·215 | Mindleech Mass | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mindleech Mass

trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME对牌手造成战斗伤害时，你可以检视该牌手的手牌。 若你如此作，则你可以使用其中一张非地的牌，且不须支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.target: 「给莫洛伊碰上」 ～地底城俚语，意指「变老」

trans-unit.source: Transmute {1}{U}{B} ({1}{U}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same converted mana cost as this card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. Play only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 易质{1}{U}{B}（{1}{U}{B}，弃掉此牌：从你的牌库中搜寻一张总法术力费用与它相同的牌，展示该牌，并置于你手上。 然后将你的牌库洗牌。 使用的时机视同法术。）

trans-unit.resname: RAV·218 | Phytohydra | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 繁生多头龙

trans-unit.target: 若CARDNAME将受到伤害，则改为在上面放置等量的+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·218 | Phytohydra | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Look at this creature, so like the Conclave it serves. Cut one head and it grows two. Damage it and it flourishes."\n—Veszka, Selesnya evangel
trans-unit.target: 「瞧瞧这东西，他与所效命的盟会有多么相似： 砍掉一个头，就长出两个； 试图打击他，却只让他更加茁壮。」 ～瑟雷尼亚福音师薇兹卡

trans-unit.resname: RAV·219 | Pollenbright Wings | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature has flying.
trans-unit.target: 受此结界的生物具有飞行异能。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·219 | Pollenbright Wings | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever enchanted creature deals combat damage to a player, put that many 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens into play.
trans-unit.target: 每当受此结界的生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，将等量之1/1绿色的腐生物衍生物放置进场。

trans-unit.source: Psychic Drain
trans-unit.target: 吸取心灵

trans-unit.target: 目标牌手将其牌库顶的X张牌置入其坟墓场，且你获得X点生命。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·220 | Psychic Drain | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Gold can be reearned, goods restored. The moroii steal youth, more precious than either, and once gone, it's gone forever."\n—Berta Suszat, civic healer
trans-unit.target: 「钱可以赚回来，东西可以重新拥有。 而莫洛伊偷走的青春远比这两者更珍贵，因为一旦失去，就再也要不回来。」 ～城市治疗师勃塔‧苏札

trans-unit.resname: RAV·221 | Putrefy | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Putrefy
trans-unit.target: 腐烂

trans-unit.resname: RAV·221 | Putrefy | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy target artifact or creature. It can't be regenerated.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标神器或生物。 它不能重生。

trans-unit.resname: RAV·221 | Putrefy | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "All matter, animate or not, rots when exposed to time. We merely speed up the process."\n—Ezoc, Golgari rot farmer
trans-unit.target: 「不论是否复生之物，所有东西都会随时间推移而腐朽。 我们只是让过程加速而已。」 ～葛加理腐尸农夫伊作

trans-unit.target: 辉耀～重置目标生物和每个与该生物有共通颜色的其它生物。 这些生物得+2/+0直到回合结束。

trans-unit.target: 尤睿拿起了残破不堪的波洛斯旗帜，其伙伴为之士气大振，随他重返战场。

trans-unit.source: Flying, vigilance, haste

trans-unit.target: 她燃烧的长剑放出慑人光芒，使敌人无从直视，箭矢为之偏移。

trans-unit.source: Only the chosen ones are spared.

trans-unit.resname: RAV·225 | Savra, Queen of the Golgari | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 葛加理女王撒芙儿
